trans-unit.source: Learn how to schedule a one-time background task, or run a periodic background task.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to schedule a one-time background task, or run a periodic background task.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have a background task that needs to run periodically, or at a specific time, to support your app.
trans-unit.target: This example assumes that you have a background task that needs to run periodically, or at a specific time, to support your app.

trans-unit.source: A background task will only run using a [**TimeTrigger**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224843) if you have called [**RequestAccessAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh700485).
trans-unit.target: A background task will only run using a [**TimeTrigger**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224843) if you have called [**RequestAccessAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/hh700485).

trans-unit.source: This topic assumes you have already created a background task class, including the Run method that is used as the background task entry point.
trans-unit.target: This topic assumes you have already created a background task class, including the Run method that is used as the background task entry point.

trans-unit.source: To get started quickly building a background task, see [Create and register a background task](create-and-register-a-background-task.md).
trans-unit.target: To get started quickly building a background task, see [Create and register a background task](create-and-register-a-background-task.md).

trans-unit.source: For more in-depth information on conditions and triggers, see [Support your app with background tasks](support-your-app-with-background-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: For more in-depth information on conditions and triggers, see [Support your app with background tasks](support-your-app-with-background-tasks.md).

trans-unit.source: Create a time trigger
trans-unit.target: Create a time trigger

trans-unit.source: Create a new [**TimeTrigger**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224843).
trans-unit.target: Create a new [**TimeTrigger**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224843).

trans-unit.source: The second parameter, *OneShot*, specifies whether the background task will run once or keep running periodically.
trans-unit.target: The second parameter, *OneShot*, specifies whether the background task will run once or keep running periodically.

trans-unit.source: If *OneShot* is set to true, the first parameter (*FreshnessTime*) specifies the number of minutes to wait before scheduling the background task.
trans-unit.target: If *OneShot* is set to true, the first parameter (*FreshnessTime*) specifies the number of minutes to wait before scheduling the background task.

trans-unit.source: If *OneShot* is set to false, *FreshnessTime* specifies the frequency by which the background task will run.
trans-unit.target: If *OneShot* is set to false, *FreshnessTime* specifies the frequency by which the background task will run.

trans-unit.source: The built-in timer for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps runs background tasks in 15-minute intervals.
trans-unit.target: The built-in timer for Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps runs background tasks in 15-minute intervals.

trans-unit.source: If *FreshnessTime* is set to 15 minutes and *OneShot* is true, the task will run once starting between 0 and 15 minutes from the time it is registered.
trans-unit.target: If *FreshnessTime* is set to 15 minutes and *OneShot* is true, the task will run once starting between 0 and 15 minutes from the time it is registered.

trans-unit.source: If *FreshnessTime* is set to 15 minutes and *OneShot* is false, the task will run every 15 minutes starting between 0 and 15 minutes from the time it is registered.
trans-unit.target: If *FreshnessTime* is set to 15 minutes and *OneShot* is false, the task will run every 15 minutes starting between 0 and 15 minutes from the time it is registered.

trans-unit.source: **Note** If *FreshnessTime* is set to less than 15 minutes, an exception is thrown when attempting to register the background task.
trans-unit.target: **Note** If *FreshnessTime* is set to less than 15 minutes, an exception is thrown when attempting to register the background task.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) Add a condition
trans-unit.target: (Optional) Add a condition

trans-unit.source: If necessary, create a background task condition to control when the task runs.
trans-unit.target: If necessary, create a background task condition to control when the task runs.

trans-unit.source: A condition prevents the background task from running until the condition is met - for more information, see [Set conditions for running a background task](set-conditions-for-running-a-background-task.md).
trans-unit.target: A condition prevents the background task from running until the condition is met - for more information, see [Set conditions for running a background task](set-conditions-for-running-a-background-task.md).

trans-unit.source: In this example the condition is set to **UserPresent** so that, once triggered, the task only runs once the user is active.
trans-unit.target: In this example the condition is set to **UserPresent** so that, once triggered, the task only runs once the user is active.

trans-unit.source: For a list of possible conditions, see [**SystemConditionType**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224835).
trans-unit.target: For a list of possible conditions, see [**SystemConditionType**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/br224835).
